title: The Energetic Adventures of Ling Nelson
summary: Ling Nelson, a 47-year-old advisor with a passion for drawing, discovers her superpowers during an extraordinary week, using them to help her community in unexpected ways.
summaryGerman: Ling Nelson, eine 47-jährige Beraterin mit einer Leidenschaft für das Zeichnen, entdeckt ihre Superkräfte während einer außergewöhnlichen Woche und nutzt sie auf unerwartete Weise, um ihrer Gemeinschaft zu helfen.
summaryDutch: Ling Nelson, een 47-jarige adviseur met een passie voor tekenen, ontdekt haar superkrachten gedurende een buitengewone week, en gebruikt ze op onverwachte manieren om haar gemeenschap te helpen.
summaryFrench: Ling Nelson, une conseillère de 47 ans passionnée de dessin, découvre ses superpouvoirs au cours d'une semaine extraordinaire et les utilise de manière inattendue pour aider sa communauté.

story.text: Ling wakes up feeling unusually energetic, her thoughts clear as she sketches a sunrise. Unbeknownst to her, each stroke imbues her with a strange new power.
At work, Ling gives advice that uncannily solves complex problems. Her colleagues marvel at her newfound wisdom and insight.
Ling’s drawings begin to predict future events. She sketches a rainstorm that surprisingly hits the town that afternoon.
Ling stops a bank robbery by drawing the thief surrendering, which then mysteriously happens seconds later. She starts to realize her powers.
Conflicted with her powers, Ling spends a romantic evening with her partner, who supports her journey and encourages her to embrace her abilities.
Empowered, Ling hosts a drawing workshop for the community’s children, showing them how to draw their dreams, giving them hope and joy.
The town celebrates Ling as a hero. She vows to use her powers to protect and inspire, drawing a beautiful future for her community.

ending: As Ling sketched a hopeful tomorrow, her heart was filled with the joy of knowing she could make a real difference.
moral: Your unique talents and passions can be a powerful force for good in the world.
